Email_1.Subject: Shocked
Email_1.Body:
I am utterly shocked! We could have saved the
    lives of those 11 people! We will just have to
    try harder next time.
	
	Your next assignment is available, but keep in
	mind your performance is being closely 
	monitored after a screw up like that.

Email_2.Subject: Keep Your Head Uo
Email_2.Body:
Hey, you are probably going through a rough
    time right now, but don't beat yourself up 
    over it. It is his fault, not your fault, that
    those people died; he is the one that killed
    those people, we just tried to prevent it.
